title: 'Captain America: Civil War'
description: 'Political interference in the Avengers activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.'

title: 'A Bigger Splash'
description: 'The vacation of a famous rock star and a filmmaker is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.'

title: 'Baaghi: A Rebel For Love'
description: 'A bounty hunter and an agent with a price on his head realize they have a common enemy.'
